_source.text: 3) Long-term prospects for the Lafayette Square area are better than Washington Square .

text: 3) Long-term prospects for the Lafayette Square area are **better** **than** **Washington** **Square** .

_source.text: After almost one and a half years of hell, the central section of Washington Square Park has just reopened, fully restored and looking better than ever.

text: After almost one and a half years of hell, the central section of **Washington** **Square** Park has just reopened, fully restored and looking **better** **than** ever.
